#include <iostream>
using std::cout;
using std::endl;

class Base
{
public:
    Base(int base = 0):base_(base)
    {
        cout << "Base()" << endl;
    }

    virtual void print()
    {
        cout << "Base::base_ = " << base_ << endl;
    }

    ~Base()
    {
        cout << "~Base()" << endl;
    }
private:
    long base_;
};

class Derived
:public Base
{
public:
    Derived(int base, int derived):Base(base), derived_(derived)
    {
        cout << "Derived()" << endl;
    }

    void print()
    {
        cout << "Derived::derived_ = " << derived_ << endl;
    }

    ~Derived()
    {
        cout << "~Derived()" << endl;
    }

private:
    long derived_;
};

void func(Base* pbase)
{
    pbase->print();
}

int main()
{
    cout << "sizeof(Base) = " << sizeof(Base) << endl;
    cout << "sizeof(Derived) = " << sizeof(Derived) << endl;
    Base base(10);
    Derived derived(20, 30);
    func(&base);
    func(&derived);
    return 0;
}

{
    size_t len1 = strlen(p1);
    size_t len2 = strlen(p2);
    size_t len = len1 + len2 + 1;
    char *ptmp = (char*)malloc(len);
    memset(ptmp, 0, len);
    strcpy(ptmp, p1);
    strcat(ptmp, p2);
    return ptmp;
}

//ç”¨æ¨¡æ¿å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªstack
//ç‰ˆæœ¬æˆå‘˜å‡½æ•°ä¸è¦å†™ä¸ºè™šå‡½æ•°
//è™šå‡½æ•°ä¸ºå®ç°åŠ¨æ€å¤šæ€ï¼Œå‘ç”Ÿåœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶
//è€Œæ¨¡æ¿éœ€è¦åœ¨ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶è¿›è¡Œç¤ºä¾‹åŒ–ï¼ŒçŸ›ç›¾
template <typename T, size_t kSize = 10>
class Stack
{
public:
    Stack():top_(-1), data_(new T[kSize]()){  }
    ~Stack();
    bool full() const;
    bool empty() const;
    void push(const T& t);
    void pop();
    T top();
private:
    int top_;
    T* data_;
};

template <typename T, size_t kSize>
Stack<T, kSize>::~Stack()
{
    if(data_)
    {
        delete [] data_;
        data_ = nullptr;
    }
}

template <typename T, size_t kSize>
bool Stack<T, kSize>::full() const
{
    return top_ == kSize - 1;
}

template <typename T, size_t kSize>
bool Stack<T, kSize>::empty() const
{
    return top_ == -1;
}

template <typename T, size_t kSize>
void Stack<T, kSize>::push(const T& t)
{
    if(full())
    {
        cout << "stack is full" << endl;
        return;
    }
    data_[++top_] = t;
}

template <typename T, size_t kSize>
void Stack<T, kSize>::pop()
{
    if(empty())
    {
        cout << "stack is empty" << endl;
        return;
    }
    --top_;
}

template <typename T, size_t kSize>
T Stack<T, kSize>::top()
{
    return data_[top_];
}
